alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Grant; Jackson; La Salle; Natchitoches; Ouachita; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 24 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of north central Louisiana and northwest Louisiana, including the following parishes, in north central Louisiana, Caldwell, Grant, Jackson, La Salle, Ouachita and Winn. In northwest Louisiana, Natchitoches. * WHEN...From 7 AM CDT this morning through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Rainfall totals of 2 to 4 inches will be possible with isolated higher amounts.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Caldwell; Grant; Jackson; La Salle; Natchitoches; Ouachita; Winn
